arithmetic.question: The price of a ball is Rs.13500. It is sold at a discount of 33 1/3%. If the rate of profit is 12.5%, what is the cost price?
Find the value: 88% of 1125 + 20% of 425
If the radius of a circle increases by 6 cm and area increases by 264 sq.cm, find the original radius.
Divide 150 into two parts such that the difference of their reciprocals is 3/112. Find the parts.
The average of 10 numbers is 14. If each number is multiplied by 6, what will be the new average?
The ratio of income of P and Q is 4:7 and their expenditure ratio is 3:7. If P saves Rs.10000 and Q saves Rs.7000, find P’s income.
A mixture contains liquids A and B in ratio 5:4. After adding 2 litres of B, ratio becomes 7:6. Find quantity of A.
What is the average of all one-digit numbers?
A box contains Rs.5, Rs.2 and Rs.1 coins in ratio 15:4:2. Total coins are 112. Find number of Rs.2 coins.
Find the volume of a hemisphere of diameter 21 cm.
A 400 ml solution contains 16% alcohol. How much pure alcohol should be added to make it 40%?
How many numbers between 244 and 332 are divisible by 7?
Nitin invests Rs.40000 and Nikhil Rs.30000. After 3 months Nitin withdraws Rs.10000. Profit at year end is Rs.10000. Find Nitin’s share.
Jim sells a dress to Sonya at 20% profit. Sonya sells to Rima at 50% profit. If Rima pays Rs.6444, find Jim’s cost price.
Find HCF of 306 and 657.
Find simple interest on Rs.8000 at 10% per annum for 3 years.
A train 120m long passes a pole in 6 seconds. Find speed in km/hr.
If cost price is increased by 20% and selling price by 10%, what happens to profit?
The ratio of ages of A and B is 3:5. After 6 years it becomes 4:5. Find present age of A.
Find the compound interest on Rs.5000 at 10% per annum for 2 years.
If the ratio of two numbers is 7:9 and their difference is 40, find the larger number.
A man buys an article for Rs.2500 and sells it at 20% profit. Find the selling price.
If 15 men can complete a work in 20 days, how many men are required to complete it in 12 days?
Find the value of (25 × 16) ÷ 20.
The average of 5 consecutive numbers is 42. Find the largest number.
Find the LCM of 24 and 36.
If a train travels 360 km in 6 hours, find its speed.
A sum doubles itself in 5 years at simple interest. Find the rate of interest.
Find the value of 3/4 of 160.
If 12% of a number is 96, find the number.
The perimeter of a rectangle is 80 cm. If length is 25 cm, find breadth.
A shopkeeper gives 10% discount and still gains 20%. Find marked price if cost price is Rs.500.
Find the HCF of 54 and 90.
If the sum of first n natural numbers is 210, find n.
Find the simple interest on Rs.6000 at 8% per annum for 2 years.
The ratio of boys to girls in a class is 4:5. If total students are 45, find number of boys.
If the cost price is Rs.400 and selling price is Rs.360, find loss percent.
Find the value of 7² + 5².
If a number is divided by 12, the remainder is 5. What will be the remainder if divided by 3?
Find the value of 5% of 2400.
If the ratio of two numbers is 5:8 and their sum is 91, find the smaller number.
A person purchased an article for Rs.1200 and sold it for Rs.1500. Find profit percent.
If 18 workers can complete a work in 15 days, how many days will 30 workers take?
Find the average of first 20 natural numbers.
The area of a square is 256 sq.cm. Find its side.
A sum of Rs.2000 amounts to Rs.2420 in 2 years at compound interest. Find the rate.
Find the LCM of 15 and 20.
If 25% of a number is 75, find the number.
Find the simple interest on Rs.10000 at 6% per annum for 3 years.
If a train travels 90 km in 1.5 hours, find its speed.
The ratio of ages of A and B is 4:7. If B is 28 years old, find A’s age.
Find the HCF of 84 and 126.
If cost price is Rs.800 and loss is 5%, find selling price.
The perimeter of a square is 64 cm. Find its area.
Find the sum of first 30 natural numbers.
If a number is increased by 20% and becomes 360, find the original number.
A boat goes 30 km upstream in 5 hours. Find speed of boat in still water if speed of stream is 2 km/hr.
Find the value of 9³.
If 3 pencils cost Rs.18, how much will 7 pencils cost?
